lead_paragraph: Quarterback Jared Goff was taken by the Los Angeles Rams with the first pick in Thursday's NFL Draft and the Philadelphia Eagles followed suit by naming signal caller Carson Wentz with the second choice.

headline.print_headline: Rams Take Quarterback Goff With First Pick of Draft
headline.main: Rams Take Quarterback Goff With First Pick of Draft
